extension.summary: Fetches selected games from Batocera and RetroPie and displays them in a Kodi widget
extension.description: Searches through gamelist.xml files in the roms directory for emulationStation-based systems like Batocera and RetroPie and displays favorited or latest games with their thumbnails and metadata as a selectable video widget.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.disclaimer: This addon only works if used ontop of an EmulationStation-based distro like Batocera or RetroPie. May work with other ES-based setups, but no guarantee is given.
extension.news: v0.2.0 (2024-10-28) - Added the ability to choose between favorites and latest added games as well as support for RetroPie and custom romdir and run command entries. v0.1.1 (2024-10-27) - Mostly works. Added support for RetroPie as well as Batocera. May work for other EmulationStation-based systems.
